Posts.Content: I am in the same position IDC grade 2, nodes and margins clear, oncologist said 98% survival in 10 years which is fantastic but decided that the oncotype test was to be certain that no chemo is needed. Results in 2 weeks more waiting. BUT feeling positive
Posts.Title: Scared about today

Posts.Content: Hi , It is a year tomorrow (18th) since I heard those life changing words " you have breast cancer" I guess I was lucky that mine was early stage IDC cancer so no chemo but 3 weeks of rads and Tamoxifen , scored 11 on oncotype test. My problem is I have lost my VA VA VOOOM,so I have been looking for healthy alternatives and I came across Maca root capsules which I have ordered from amazon along with some Panax ginseng, the reviews are really good for women with menopause, PMT, low libido etc. Has anyone any advice or using some other supplements to bring back your sex drive, and is it ok to use these as I was estrogen positive.
Posts.Title: Maca root extract for VA VA VOOM

Posts.Content: They never  recommended chemo, every thing depended on my Oncotype results. It is 6 weeks since my lumpectomy. Give the hospital a ring to see what is happening, or speak to your Breast care nurse.x
Posts.Title: THE WAITING !!!

Posts.Content: Waiting for my oncotype test to come back when they have already told me that I will only benefit 2% from having chemo, so will only need radiotherapy, sick of waiting, just want to get on with it and draw a line under this rollercoaster. Anyone in the same boat and if so what results from it , I had 23mm grade 2 removed , lymph nodes clear, and also clear margins, ER + HER2 negative. Feeling fed up
Posts.Title: THE WAITING !!!

Posts.Content: Thanks for everyone's replies. It was worth the wait my Oncotype score came back at 11 so i have to say i am over the moon as NO CHEMO recommended. Starting my hormone tablets' tamoxifen'  today and now WAITING for my Radiotherapy pre assessment. Feeling Positive x
Posts.Title: THE WAITING !!!
